Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 75th/Stewart
ShortDescription: Eastbound 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via  74th, Halsted, 76th, Vincennes and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/Stewart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via  74th, Halsted, 76th, Vincennes and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/Stewart.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
